WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL-SOUTHEAST COAST.
DNC 01.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS UNTIL 05 SEP
   BY M/V SW EMPRESS TOWING 14 8334 METER LONG CABLES
   IN AREA BOUND BY
   22-13.32S 040-08.43W, 22-14.18S 039-54.35W,
   22-15.30S 039-55.12W, 22-15.43S 040-08.32W.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 06 SEP 21.
